seleccioneQuitar: Select a permission from the configured Role to remove
yaEstaEnFamilia: The permission is already in the family:
yaTienePermiso: The selected family already has the permission
ingreseNombre: Enter a name for the new role
estaSeguro: Are you sure you want to delete the role ID:
yaEstaAsignadoModificar: The role is already assigned to a user, it cannot be modified
yaEstaAsignadoEliminar: The role is already assigned to a user, it cannot be deleted
seleccioneComboBox: Select a Role from the dropdown list
deseaCerrar: Do you want to log out?
